calculations.name: Delta Down T USD OTR Parallel
calculations.tableau_expression:
zn([Delta Down T USD 3M])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 1Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 2Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 5Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 7Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 10Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 30Y])


// ZN logic added 7/25/2017

calculation_context.Expression:
zn([Delta Down T USD 3M])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 1Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 2Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 5Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 7Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 10Y])+
zn([Delta Down T USD 30Y])


// ZN logic added 7/25/2017

calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 3M:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then    //Major USD
        IF  ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Month" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "3M Cash" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        THEN 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END


when "sUSOMid" then    //Major USD REPO  Added July 25th 2017
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "O/N" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "T/N" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Week" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Week" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Week" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Month" 

        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Month"  
        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then  //6m USD Basis
         0

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "O/N" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "T/N" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Month" OR   
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Week" OR    // Brought in May 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Week" OR    // Brought in May 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Week" OR    // Brought in May 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Month" OR    // Brought in May 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Month"  OR     // Brought in May 2017
        ([Risk Date # of Days]<=91 and (contains([TERM_LABEL],"D") or int(right([TERM_LABEL],2)) >=17)) //Added on 3/16/2018 by ADF

        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then     // USD SOFR curve added January 27, 2023
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "O/N" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "T/N" OR 
        ([Risk Date # of Days]<=91)
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        

end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 2Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then   //Major CAD 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month Swap"
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+[Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        THEN 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then    1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        THEN 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr Swap"
        THEN ([Delta Down T USD]+[Fix Value T]) else 0 END


when "sUSOMid" then   //Major CAD REPO  Added Jully 25th 2017
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" OR
                ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap" OR
                ([TERM_LABEL])= "2Y" 

        then   [Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T] else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
         +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month"
        THEN 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "18 Month"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "21 Month"
        then 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD12mMid" then if //12m USD Basis Added July 25th 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS CAD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" 
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        THEN 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr Swap"or
        ([Risk Date # of Days]>365 and  [Risk Date # of Days]<=731 and  int(right([TERM_LABEL],2)) >=17) //Added for meeting Dates by ADF on 3/16/2018
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL]) = "3 Yr Swap"
        THEN 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL]) = "4 Yr Swap"
        THEN 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "2 Yr" OR ([TERM_LABEL]) = "2 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([Risk Date # of Days]>365 and [Risk Date # of Days]<=731)
        THEN ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END

end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 1Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then  //Major USD
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        THEN 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month Swap"
        then 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+[Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        THEN 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END

when "sUSOMid" then    //Major USD REPO  Added July 25th 2017
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 

        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end


when "USDsUSD12mMid" then    //12m Basis   Added July 25th 2017
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 

        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month"
        THEN 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "18 Month"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "21 Month"
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END


when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month"  
        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" OR  ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month Swap" or
        ([Risk Date # of Days]>91 and  [Risk Date # of Days]<=365 and  int(right([TERM_LABEL],2)) >=17) //Added for meeting Dates by ADF on 3/16/2018
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" 
        then 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END

when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then 
        IF ([Risk Date # of Days]>91 and [Risk Date # of Days]<=365)
        THEN([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END


end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 10Y:
// Modified calculations to Include term label= 1 Yr Swap etc.- Shyamala- 12-12-2018
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then   //Major USD
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap" 
        then    1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap" 
        then    2/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap" 
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" 
        then    18/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" 
        then    15/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then    10/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap" 
        then    5/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD12mMid" then if //12m USD Basis  Added July 25th 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap" 
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap" 
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap" 
        then 5/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then if  // SOFR Major Curve
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap" 
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap" 
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "10 Yr Swap"
        THEN ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "11 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "11 Yr Swap" 
        then 19/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap" 
        then 18/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap" 
        then 15/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap" 
        then 10/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap" 
        then 5/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 end


end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 5Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then   //Major USD
        if  ([TERM_LABEL])="3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"   
        then    1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then    2/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        then    1/2*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        THEN 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        THEN 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END


when "USDsUSD12mMid" then if //12m USD Basis Added July 25th 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        then 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then if  // Major Curve SOFR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "3 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([Risk Date # of Days]>731 and [Risk Date # of Days]<=1400)
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        then 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 7Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then   //Major USD
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        then    1/2*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap"
        then    2/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap"
        then    1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])="6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap"
        then 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap"
        then    2/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap"
        then    1/3*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD12mMid" then if //12m USD Basis  Added July 25th 2017
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap" 
        then 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then if  // SOFR Major Curve
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Yr Swap" 
        then 1/2*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "7 Yr Swap"
        then([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "8 Yr Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Yr Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 30Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then   //Major CAD
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap"
        then    2/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap"
        then    5/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap"
        then    10/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap"
        then    15/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T] ) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if //1m USD basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
 

when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr Swap" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end



when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS CAD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr Swap" or
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr Swap" OR 
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "50 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "50 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap"
        then 15/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end

when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then   //Major USD
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "11 Yr" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "11 Yr Swap"
        THEN 1/20*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Yr Swap"
        then    2/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Yr Swap"
        then    5/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "20 Yr Swap"
        then    10/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "25 Yr Swap"
        then    15/20*([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "30 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T] ) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "40 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        if      ([TERM_LABEL])= "50 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "50 Yr Swap"
        then    ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) else 0 end


end
calculated_fields.Date (End Date):
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    [Max Date Exclude] else [Parameters].[End Date]
end
